slides.title: 2D Shapes
slides.content:
**Square:** Area=a², Perimeter=4a
**Rectangle:** Area=l×b, Perimeter=2(l+b)
**Circle:** Area=πr², Circumference=2πr
**Triangle:** Area=½×b×h

slides.title: 3D Shapes
slides.content:
**Cube:** Volume=a³, Surface=6a²
**Cuboid:** Volume=l×b×h, Surface=2(lb+bh+lh)
**Cylinder:** Volume=πr²h, Surface=2πr(r+h)
**Sphere:** Volume=4/3πr³, Surface=4πr²
